text: Shinjinai mono wa,`watashi-tachi wa kono kuruān mo shinjinaishi, mata kore izen ni atta Keisuke mo shinjimasen.' To iu. Fugi o okonatta mono ga,-nushi no gozen ni tatasa reru toki no sugata o, anata ni misete yaritai mono. Kare-ra wa tagaini (soto ni tsumi o owa sete) nonoshiri au.
